exampleEn: Compact cars are popular in crowded cities.
The insurance company offers a 24-hour towing service.
exampleKo: 그 보험 회사는 24시간 견인 서비스를 제공합니다.

exampleEn: We watched the parade pass by.
The city plans to pave the dirt road.
The increase in traffic necessitated the road expansion.
exampleKo: 교통량 증가는 도로 확장을 필요하게 만들었습니다.

exampleEn: All vehicles must conform to safety standards.
exampleKo: 모든 차량은 안전 기준에 부합해야 합니다.

exampleEn: Consumers prefer fuel-efficient hybrids.
exampleKo: 소비자들은 연료 효율이 높은 하이브리드 차량을 선호합니다.

exampleEn: The train was pulling several wagons filled with coal.
exampleKo: 기차는 석탄이 가득 찬 화물 기차(화차) 여러 대를 끌고 있었습니다.

meaning: (공공 교통 기관의) 이용자 수, 승객 수
exampleEn: Public transit ridership has increased by 10%.
The ferry pulled into the harbor on time.
He is a specialist in urban transportation planning.
It is difficult to navigate through the narrow streets.
exampleKo: 좁은 거리를 뚫고 길을 찾는 것은 어렵습니다.

exampleEn: There was strong opposition to the new highway project.
exampleKo: 새 고속도로 프로젝트에 대한 강한 반대가 있었습니다.

exampleEn: The city is restoring its historic streetcar line.
exampleKo: 도시는 역사적인 전차 노선을 복원하고 있습니다.

exampleEn: This area is reserved for pedestrians only.
Drivers must bear a valid license at all times.
exampleKo: 운전자들은 항상 유효한 면허증을 몸에 지녀야(소지해야) 합니다.

exampleEn: The mayor was emphatic about the need for better roads.
exampleKo: 시장은 더 나은 도로의 필요성에 대해 단호했습니다.

exampleEn: Old cars give off harmful emissions.
A passerby witnessed the accident.
The bicycle wheel has a broken spoke.
exampleKo: 자전거 바퀴에 부러진 바퀴살이 하나 있습니다.

exampleEn: Illegally parked cars will be towed away.
Please keep the sidewalk clear for pedestrians.
There is a wheelchair ramp at the entrance.
You can lock your bike at the bicycle rack.
exampleKo: 자전거 보관대에 자전거를 잠가 둘 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: I took the overnight express bus to Seoul.
The drawbridge opens to let ships pass.
Taxi drivers often expect a gratuity.
The hotel is inconveniently located far from the station.
exampleKo: 그 호텔은 역에서 멀리 떨어져 있어 불편하게 위치해 있습니다.

exampleEn: The train carriage was full of passengers.
The city is surrounded by mountains.
He hastily packed his bags and left.
The station was refurbished last year.
